title: A Tale of Two Cities - which is true of sentence

content.question: Which of the following is true of the sentence “It was prevalent everywhere” (fourth sentence) ?

choices.label: The sentence echoes the rhythm of those that precede it.
The sentence introduces a series of sentences similar to it in style.
The brevity of the sentence emphasizes its content.
The understatement in the sentence conveys an ironic meaning.

content.answer: The brevity of the sentence emphasizes its content.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
